question:
Click the Exhibit button.
The resource requested by the RequestDispatcher is available and implemented by the
DestinationServlet. What is the result?

options.A: An exception is thrown at runtime by SourceServlet.
options.B: An exception is thrown at runtime by DestinationServlet.
options.C: Only “hello from dest” appears in the response output stream.
options.D: Both “hello from source” and “hello from dest” appear in the response output stream.
